verses.verse: Now the sons <WH1121> of Issachar <WH3485> were, Tola <WH8439>, and Puah <WH6312>, Jashub <WH3437>, and Shimron <WH8110>, four <WH702>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Tola <WH8439>; Uzzi <WH5813>, and Rephaiah <WH7509>, and Jeriel <WH3400>, and Jahmai <WH3181>, and Jibsam <WH3005>, and Shemuel <WH8050>, heads <WH7218> of their father's <WH1> house <WH1004>, to wit, of Tola <WH8439>: they were valiant men <WH1368> of might <WH2428> in their generations <WH8435>; whose number <WH4557> was in the days <WH3117> of David <WH1732> two <WH8147> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> and six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Uzzi <WH5813>; Izrahiah <WH3156>: and the sons <WH1121> of Izrahiah <WH3156>; Michael <WH4317>, and Obadiah <WH5662>, and Joel <WH3100>, Ishiah <WH3449>, five <WH2568>: all of them chief men <WH7218>.

And with them, by their generations <WH8435>, after the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>, were bands <WH1416> of soldiers <WH6635> for war <WH4421>, six <WH8337> and thirty <WH7970> thousand <WH505> men: for they had many <WH7235> wives <WH802> and sons <WH1121>.

And their brethren <WH251> among all the families <WH4940> of Issachar <WH3485> were valiant <WH1368> men of might <WH2428>, reckoned in all by their genealogies <WH3187> fourscore <WH8084> and seven <WH7651> thousand <WH505>.
¶ The sons of Benjamin <WH1144>; Bela <WH1106>, and Becher <WH1071>, and Jediael <WH3043>, three <WH7969>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Bela <WH1106>; Ezbon <WH675>, and Uzzi <WH5813>, and Uzziel <WH5816>, and Jerimoth <WH3406>, and Iri <WH5901>, five <WH2568>; heads <WH7218> of the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>, mighty <WH1368> men of valour <WH2428>; and were reckoned by their genealogies <WH3187> twenty <WH6242> and two <WH8147> thousand <WH505> and thirty <WH7970> and four <WH702>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Becher <WH1071>; Zemira <WH2160>, and Joash <WH3135>, and Eliezer <WH461>, and Elioenai <WH454>, and Omri <WH6018>, and Jerimoth <WH3406>, and Abiah <WH29>, and Anathoth <WH6068>, and Alameth <WH5964>. All these are the sons <WH1121> of Becher <WH1071>.

And the number <WH3187> of them, after their genealogy by their generations <WH8435>, heads <WH7218> of the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>, mighty men <WH1368> of valour <WH2428>, was twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> and two hundred <WH3967>.

The sons <WH1121> also of Jediael <WH3043>; Bilhan <WH1092>: and the sons <WH1121> of Bilhan <WH1092>; Jeush <WH3274>, and Benjamin <WH1144>, and Ehud <WH164>, and Chenaanah <WH3668>, and Zethan <WH2133>, and Tharshish <WH8659>, and Ahishahar <WH300>.

All these the sons <WH1121> of Jediael <WH3043>, by the heads <WH7218> of their fathers <WH1>, mighty <WH1368> men of valour <WH2428>, were seventeen <WH7651> <WH6240> thousand <WH505> and two hundred <WH3967> soldiers, fit to go out <WH3318> for war <WH6635> and battle <WH4421>.
Shuppim <WH8206> also, and Huppim <WH2650>, the children <WH1121> of Ir <WH5893>, and Hushim <WH2366>, the sons <WH1121> of Aher <WH313>.
¶ The sons <WH1121> of Naphtali <WH5321>; Jahziel <WH3185>, and Guni <WH1476>, and Jezer <WH3337>, and Shallum <WH7967>, the sons <WH1121> of Bilhah <WH1090>.
¶ The sons <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519>; Ashriel <WH844>, whom she bare <WH3205>: (but his concubine <WH6370> the Aramitess <WH761> bare <WH3205> Machir <WH4353> the father <WH1> of Gilead <WH1568>:

And Machir <WH4353> took <WH3947> to wife <WH802> the sister of Huppim <WH2650> and Shuppim <WH8206>, whose sister's <WH269> name <WH8034> was Maachah <WH4601>;) and the name <WH8034> of the second <WH8145> was Zelophehad <WH6765>: and Zelophehad <WH6765> had daughters <WH1323>.

And Maachah <WH4601> the wife <WH802> of Machir <WH4353> bare <WH3205> a son <WH1121>, and she called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Peresh <WH6570>; and the name <WH8034> of his brother <WH251> was Sheresh <WH8329>; and his sons <WH1121> were Ulam <WH198> and Rakem <WH7552>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Ulam <WH198>; Bedan <WH917>. These were the sons <WH1121> of Gilead <WH1568>, the son <WH1121> of Machir <WH4353>, the son <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519>.
And his sister <WH269> Hammoleketh <WH4447> bare <WH3205> Ishod <WH379>, and Abiezer <WH44>, and Mahalah <WH4244>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Shemida <WH8061> were, Ahian <WH291>, and Shechem <WH7928>, and Likhi <WH3949>, and Aniam <WH593>.

¶ And the sons <WH1121> of Ephraim <WH669>; Shuthelah <WH7803>, and Bered <WH1260> his son <WH1121>, and Tahath <WH8480> his son <WH1121>, and Eladah <WH497> his son <WH1121>, and Tahath <WH8480> his son <WH1121>,

¶ And Zabad <WH2066> his son <WH1121>, and Shuthelah <WH7803> his son <WH1121>, and Ezer <WH5827>, and Elead <WH496>, whom the men <WH582> of Gath <WH1661> that were born <WH3205> in that land <WH776> slew <WH2026>, because they came down <WH3381> to take away <WH3947> their cattle <WH4735>.
And Ephraim <WH669> their father <WH1> mourned <WH56> many <WH7227> days <WH3117>, and his brethren <WH251> came <WH935> to comfort <WH5162> him.

¶ And when he went in <WH935> to his wife <WH802>, she conceived <WH2029>, and bare <WH3205> a son <WH1121>, and he called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Beriah <WH1283>, because it went evil <WH7451> with his house <WH1004>.
(And his daughter <WH1323> was Sherah <WH7609>, who built <WH1129> Beth-horon <WH1032> the nether <WH8481>, and the upper <WH5945>, and Uzzen-sherah <WH242>.)
And Rephah <WH7506> was his son <WH1121>, also Resheph <WH7566>, and Telah <WH8520> his son <WH1121>, and Tahan <WH8465> his son <WH1121>,
Laadan <WH3936> his son <WH1121>, Ammihud <WH5989> his son <WH1121>, Elishama <WH476> his son <WH1121>,
Non <WH5126> his son <WH1121>, Jehoshua <WH3091> his son <WH1121>.

¶ And their possessions <WH272> and habitations <WH4186> were, Beth-el <WH1008> and the towns <WH1323> thereof, and eastward <WH4217> Naaran <WH5295>, and westward <WH4628> Gezer <WH1507>, with the towns <WH1323> thereof; Shechem <WH7927> also and the towns <WH1323> thereof, unto Gaza <WH5804> and the towns <WH1323> thereof:

And by the borders <WH3027> of the children <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519>, Beth-shean <WH1052> and her towns <WH1323>, Taanach <WH8590> and her towns <WH1323>, Megiddo <WH4023> and her towns <WH1323>, Dor <WH1756> and her towns <WH1323>. In these dwelt <WH3427> the children <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130> the son <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.
¶ The sons <WH1121> of Asher <WH836>; Imnah <WH3232>, and Isuah <WH3440>, and Ishuai <WH3438>, and Beriah <WH1283>, and Serah <WH8294> their sister <WH269>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Beriah <WH1283>; Heber <WH2268>, and Malchiel <WH4439>, who is the father <WH1> of Birzavith <WH1269>.
And Heber <WH2268> begat <WH3205> Japhlet <WH3310>, and Shomer <WH7763>, and Hotham <WH2369>, and Shua <WH7774> their sister <WH269>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Japhlet <WH3310>; Pasach <WH6457>, and Bimhal <WH1118>, and Ashvath <WH6220>. These are the children <WH1121> of Japhlet <WH3310>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Shamer <WH8106>; Ahi <WH277>, and Rohgah <WH7303>, Jehubbah <WH3160>, and Aram <WH758>.
And the sons <WH1121> of his brother <WH251> Helem <WH1987>; Zophah <WH6690>, and Imna <WH3234>, and Shelesh <WH8028>, and Amal <WH6000>.
The sons <WH1121> of Zophah <WH6690>; Suah <WH5477>, and Harnepher <WH2774>, and Shual <WH7777>, and Beri <WH1275>, and Imrah <WH3236>,
Bezer <WH1221>, and Hod <WH1936>, and Shamma <WH8037>, and Shilshah <WH8030>, and Ithran <WH3506>, and Beera <WH878>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Jether <WH3500>; Jephunneh <WH3312>, and Pispah <WH6462>, and Ara <WH690>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Ulla <WH5925>; Arah <WH733>, and Haniel <WH2592>, and Rezia <WH7525>.

All these were the children <WH1121> of Asher <WH836>, heads <WH7218> of their father's <WH1> house <WH1004>, choice <WH1305> and mighty men <WH1368> of valour <WH2428>, chief <WH7218> of the princes <WH5387>. And the number <WH4557> throughout the genealogy <WH3187> of them that were apt to the war <WH6635> and to battle <WH4421> was twenty <WH6242> and six <WH8337> thousand <WH505> men <WH582>.
